name: SKYNETRA 2026
description: Explore cutting-edge drone technology, witness thrilling live demonstrations, and get hands-on experience with innovative drone systems at SKYNETRA, where creativity meets technology! SKYNETRA is a four-day technical event featuring expert sessions, hands-on workshops, live drone demonstrations, and exciting challenges.
rules: Team Size: 2-4 members (Duo, Trio or Squad)
All team members must carry valid college ID cards
Decision of the judges will be final

name: Water Polo 2026
description: Compete in the Inter-Department Water Polo Competition with your team and showcase speed, skill, and teamwork in exciting matches! This thrilling aquatic sport brings together the best swimmers to compete for glory.
tag_line: Dive In, Play Hard, Win Big!
rules: Team must consist of 7 players (5 + 2 Substitutes)
Deadline for form submission: 12 Feb, 2026 5:30 PM
All participants must carry valid college ID cards
Decision of the referees will be final

name: Squid Game 2.0
description: Enter the ultimate survival game where every move counts. Trust no one, play smart, and fight to win it all!    Step into thrilling challenges designed just for YOU. Enjoy fun, fast-paced games that test your wits, speed, and strategy.
tag_line: Survive the Game, Win the Glory!
rules: Deadline for form submission: 20 Feb, 2026 till 5:00 PM
Participants must follow game rules strictly
Fair play is mandatory - any misconduct leads to disqualification
Decision of the organizers will be final

name: Badminton 2026
description: Smash, drop, and rally your way to victory!       Calling all badminton enthusiasts! We're excited to host the Inter-Department Badminton Competition featuring thrilling solo and duo matches. Get ready to showcase your skill, speed, and strategy on the court!
rules: Solo:  30 per head | Duo:  50 per team
Deadline for form submission: 12 Feb, 2026 Till 5:00 PM
Participants must carry valid college ID cards
Decision of the referees will be final

name: Game Zone 2026
description: Game Zone is an interactive gaming arena featuring PS5 and VR experiences, offering high-energy competitive and fun gameplay. Participants can enjoy popular console and virtual reality games in a professionally managed setup with timed slots, live scoring, and exciting rewards.
